desc: We are a 100% PT & OT owned small manufacturer that makes equipment we wanted, but could not find. We do not want to be a "me too" manufacturer. If there is not value for the patient, then we don't make the product. We don't make products that will sit in the back of a closet.

layout.text: The ADL Balance Trainer helps you STAND, SHIFT, STEP & REACH for better balance!
